mapper.update:
update trustee_trade
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trustee_id = #{record.trusteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_id = #{record.fundId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fund_name = #{record.fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unit = #{record.unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit_price = #{record.unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest_rate = #{record.interestRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{record.total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update trustee_trade set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trustee_id = #{record.trusteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_id = #{record.fundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fund_name = #{record.fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unit = #{record.unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_price = #{record.unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest_rate = #{record.interestRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{record.total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update trustee_trade
trustee_id = #{trusteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest_rate = #{interestRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update trustee_trade set trustee_id = #{trusteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest_rate = #{interestRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id, status, trustee_id as trusteeId, NAME, fund_id as fundId, fund_name as fundName, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, unit, unit_price as unitPrice, interest_rate as interestRate, total, create_time as createTime FROM trustee_trade order by create_time desc

SELECT id, status, trustee_id as trusteeId, NAME, fund_id as fundId, fund_name as fundName, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, unit, unit_price as unitPrice, interest_rate as interestRate, total, create_time as createTime FROM trustee_trade WHERE id = #{id}
